samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This demo shows for Javascript Scheduler features such as Multiple views, Templates, Resources, Grouping, Timezone, Timescale, etc...

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo shows how the Scheduler control functionalities work with the default set of minimal configurations in a Vue application.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo shows how to populate appointments in the Vue Scheduler through local data sources like JSON data types with the proper date format.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo shows how to populate appointments or events in the Vue Scheduler through remote data sources such as web services, web API, URL, and OData.

samples.name: Sync Google Calendar
samples.description: This example shows how to synchronously work with Vue Scheduler and Google Calendar by converting Scheduler events to the required format.

samples.name: Real-Time Binding
samples.description: This demo showcases the way of binding signalR services to Scheduler component. Here, the SignalR is used to bind the data with Scheduler.

samples.name: Recurring Events
samples.description: This demo shows how to define recurring events (appointments) with different patterns and rules that meet iCalendar specifications in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Blocking Dates and Time
samples.description: This example shows how to block specific days or time intervals on the Vue Scheduler that helps to mark unavailable time or days in Calendar.

samples.name: Search Events
samples.description: This example shows how to filter the appointments or events of the Vue Scheduler based on a search string in a particular field or all fields.

samples.name: Timezone
samples.description: This demo shows how the Vue Scheduler works with different time zones. The events in the Scheduler automatically adapt to the selected time zone.

samples.name: External Drag and Drop
samples.description: This demo shows the ability to drag and drop appointments from an external source (such as the DataGrid, ListView, etc.)  into the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Multiple Events Drag
samples.description: This demo explains you about the ability to select multiple appointments and drag them simultaneously.

samples.name: Inline Editing
samples.description: The example showcases the inline mode of the Vue Scheduler that is used to create an appointment or edit an existing appointment's subject easily and quickly.

samples.name: Virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This example illustrates how to achieve high performance in the Vue Scheduler using virtual scrolling to load resources and events on demand.

samples.name: Data Virtualization
samples.description: This example illustrates how to load events on demand in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Basic Views
samples.description: This example demonstrates the basic views (day, week, workweek, and month) of the Vue Scheduler control with their default configurations.

samples.name: Timeline Views
samples.description: This example presents timeline views (day, week, workweek, and month) of the Vue Scheduler with their default configurations.

samples.name: Agenda View
samples.description: This demo shows the agenda view of the Vue Schedule that displays events as a list with virtual scrolling, with a number of initially loaded days.

samples.name: Month Agenda View
samples.description: This demo presents the Vue Scheduler month-agenda view, which follows the month-view layout while displaying events for a selected date.

samples.name: Year View
samples.description: This example presents a year view of the Vue Scheduler that displays appointments or events for an entire year with a horizontal or vertical layout.

samples.name: Custom Month View
samples.description: This example showcases how to customize the starting week of the month and also customize the number of weeks to be rendered in month view with Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Individual View Settings
samples.description: TThis demo shows how to configure different settings for each view in the Vue Scheduler, like applying event templates to the month view alone.

samples.name: View Intervals
samples.description: This demo shows how to design own custom views like 3 days, 2 weeks, 4 months apart from the default day, work week, month in Vue Event Scheduler.

samples.name: Room Scheduler
samples.description: This demo shows how to design a meeting room calendar, conference room calendar, and cabin room manager using our Vue event calendar control.

samples.name: Fare Calendar
samples.description: This demo is a real-time airfare calendar showcase application with flight and airfare details using the Vue Scheduler control.

samples.name: Resources
samples.description: This demo shows how to define recurring events (appointments) with different patterns and rules that meet iCalendar specifications in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Shared Events
samples.description: This demo presents event (appointment) sharing, which enables a single event to be shared by multiple resources in the Vue Scheduler event calendar.

samples.name: Different Work Days
samples.description: This demo shows how to set different workdays for each resource in a group to build a doctor availability application in the Vue event calendar.

samples.name: Show/Hide Resources
samples.description: This demo shows how to dynamically add or remove resources from the Vue Scheduler layout along with their appointments (events).

samples.name: Row Auto Height
samples.description: This demo shows how the work cells of the Vue Scheduler adjust their height automatically based on the number of events present in those time ranges.

samples.name: Horizontal Grouping
samples.description: This demo shows how to group multiple resources (e.g., airlines) in the Vue Scheduler. The resource header can be customized using a template.

samples.name: Timeline Grouping
samples.description: This demo shows how to group multiple resources with timeline views in the Vue Schedule and how to display resources with expanded and collapsed headers.

samples.name: Date-wise Grouping
samples.description: This demo shows how to group multiple resources by date in the Vue Scheduler. The resource row is rendered under each date in the header.

samples.name: Hierarchical Grouping
samples.description: This demo shows how to group resources in a hierarchical structure for parent-child resources in the Vue Scheduler control.

samples.name: Adaptive Grouping
samples.description: This demo shows how to change the mode of the Schedule to Adaptive mode in the Vue Scheduler control.

samples.name: Cell
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the default appearance of work cells with images, links, and coloring styles using cell templates in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Date Header
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the default appearance of date header cells with images and links using the template option in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the look and feel of appointments (events) in the Vue Shceduler with images and links by using an event template.

samples.name: Tooltip
samples.description: This demo shows how to enable tooltips (popovers) in Vue Scheduler appointments (events) and customize them using a tooltip template.

samples.name: Quick Info Template
samples.description: The example showcases the customized quick info popups for cells and events using the templates that help to override the built-in style in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Field Validation
samples.description: This demo covers the Appointment field validation that adds default and custom validation rules to the editor fields of the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Additional Fields
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize appointment editor (event window) with additional fields using pop-up open events in the Vue event calendar.

samples.name: Editor Template
samples.description: This demo shows how to design custom appointment (event) editor windows by adding or removing fields from the Vue Scheduler appointment window.

samples.name: Header Rows
samples.description: This demo shows how to include additional header rows like week number and month number on the timeline view in the Vue event calendar.

samples.name: Timescale
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the default timescale with interval, show/hide gridlines, slots count, and template in Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Context Menu
samples.description: This example shows how to integrate the context menu within the Vue Scheduler and control the related functionalities using menu options.

samples.name: Header Bar
samples.description: This demo shows how to use templating to customize the header bar of the Vue Scheduler with images, links, styles, and other UI controls.

samples.name: Scroll Time
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to scroll to a specific time programmatically based on the selected time in the Vue Scheduler control.

samples.name: Work Days
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the workdays and the first day of the week to fit different work schedules in the Vue Scheduler.

samples.name: Hide Non-Working Days
samples.description: This demo shows how to show or hide weekend days in the Vue Scheduler, which is similar to the workweek view, but with customizable workdays.

samples.name: Work Hours
samples.description: This demo shows how to customize the work hour range on the Vue Scheduler calendar, allowing business hours other than 9 AM to 6 PM.

samples.name: Day Hour Limit
samples.description: This demo shows how to limit the start and end hours in the Vue Scheduler which is applicable for all views and used here to render business hours only.

samples.name: Cell Dimension
samples.description: This demo shows how to change the default width and height of work cells, allowing the Vue Scheduler to be viewable zoomed in or zoomed out.

samples.name: Read-only Events
samples.description: This demo shows how to make specific events in the Vue Scheduler read-only, making them viewable but not editable by end users.

samples.name: Reminder
samples.description: This demo showcases an event reminder notification that will be displayed after 5 seconds of sample getting loaded.

samples.name: Excel Exporting
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to export Vue Scheduler events (appointments) to the Microsoft Excel file format on the client side.

samples.name: Export and Import ICS
samples.description: This demo shows how to handle exporting to ICS and importing from ICS in the Vue Scheduler. The ICS file must come from Google Calendar or MS Outlook.

samples.name: Print
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to print all the appointments (events) in the Vue Scheduler on the client side using the Print Library.

samples.name: Rule Generator
samples.description: This demo showcases how to generate various recurrence pattern rules, such as daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly, using the Recurrence Editor.

samples.name: Populate Rule
samples.description: This demo shows how to populate a predefined set of recurrence rules in the Recurrence Editor fields to help users create recurring events.

samples.name: Keyboard Interaction
samples.description: This demo showcases all the available keyboard shortcuts that help users perform actions using only the keyboard in the Vue Scheduler control.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This demo lists the client-side events triggered on Vue Scheduler actions in the Event Tracer. The Event Tracer also includes a Clear option.
